name: Existence: The Outer Reach
summary: Existence is a grand RTS that puts you in command of an empire that is expanding across the galaxy. Colonize planets by building bases and extracting valuable resources to build your forces. Attack enemy colonies on planets with mechs and native wildlife. Fight for space superiority with your fleets. Explore the galaxy to discover new planets that offer unique wildlife that can be trained. Monopolize rare minerals to build the devastating weapons capable of exterminating an entire planet.
